entry.title: Of Love and War
entry.summary:
Author: DianneRose2016

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,538Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 612

Summary: Set after Eddie is shot, Season 4, episode 14, but we are pretending that Eddie and Ana never dated. When Eddie’s gunshot wound puts him into a coma, Buck discovers that he is the one appointed to raise Christopher. It doesn’t go over well when Eddie’s parents arrive and start to demand to take Christopher back to Texas with them. Buck isn’t going to lay down and take their crap. Eddie didn’t want Christopher with them and Buck was going to make sure they never got any time with Christopher. But as the days turn into weeks and weeks turn into months, Buck is struggling to pay not only his bills, but also Eddie’s at the house. Buck never expected to be a single parent, but he wasn’t going to let Eddie down. He loved the man too much to fail either him or his son. But when Eddie wakes up, how will he feel about all of the changes? And will his own growing feelings for Buck still be there? One second Eddie was standing on the street and the next he was waking up in a hospital bed with a war going on all around him. Unlike before though, he isn’t alone and him and Buck were not going to let his parents win, no matter what.

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,289Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

They drink too much, know too much weird trivia, and keep trying to karaoke boyband hits.And somehow?They become his favorite part of the week.Five nights of firehouse chaos from behind the bar — and one night when Ben sees who they really are.

entry.title: Foundations
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,000Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 234

Summary: When Buck’s estranged parents show up unannounced at Eddie’s house, claiming they want to meet their grandson, Buck’s world tilts on its axis. Forced to confront the ghosts of his past, Buck struggles to balance old wounds with the new life he’s built alongside Eddie and Christopher. With Eddie’s unwavering support and Christopher’s innocent wisdom, Buck begins to see that the family he’s created is far stronger than the one that tried to break him. He's learning to accept the love he deserves.

entry.title: Til the words come back
entry.summary:
Author: Vike02002

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,192Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 2

Summary: AU :Eddie is in the military, operating on ground in Afghanistan. He walks past the bullets, the dead, and dust. One day, he starts reading a book one of his comrades gave him, without any expectation of it being good.He becomes obsessed with the reading, which gives him a little time to fly away from war, and decides to send a letter to the adress written at the end of the book.At the same time, on the other side of the ocean, in Los Angeles, Buck struggles to finish writing his last book, and has to deal with a fan obsessed with him at the point where he finds himself in danger.At some point, their both worlds will colapse, and create maybe the best story ever written.

entry.title: We'll crawl home to him...
entry.summary:
Author: KeeperOfDragons

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,865Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 44

Summary: "What firehouse?" I asked my heart racing. Okay, calm down, I’m sure everyone is fine. "118 I heard, they always seem to be in the midst of trouble. At least they stopped the virus, I wonder who died," said the man. I pulled over the car, "I'm sorry, I have to go now, I know this isn't your stop, but I have to go. I have to go." I ramble, pulling out my phone and opening my contacts. Come on, Come on! Please you've gotta be okay he has to be Okay- Or When Eddie gets the tragic news of Bobby’s death, he knows he has to return home to the 118, to his real family and to Buck. The whole family is shaken and broken by the death of their beloved captain/dad/husband, but together they find a sense of comfort in their collective grief. But not everything is as it seems after Moira escapes custody the night of Bobby’s funeral, taking with her a dose of the lethal virus that destroyed their family. One thing is for sure, the 118 was not about to let someone else’s family suffer the same loss they did no matter the cost they were gonna find and stop Moira…

entry.title: The History of Cinnamon Sorrow
entry.summary:
Author: ElvenSorceress

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 119,380Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 237

Summary: “Now that you’re here, we should discuss Christopher staying with us for the foreseeable future. It would be so much better for him. He should be able to have a mother’s care. I’m really the only mother he’s ever known.”Eddie rankles at the words. But knew she’d say it. He’s so fucking tired.He can’t even imagine what his mother would say if she knew Eddie was in love with a man and that Chris will probably never have any mother except Shannon. “I was guessing Chris will want to stay where he is. For now. I don’t want to uproot him. Not when he’s happy and doing well.”She actually smiles this time. For real. “That’s a very caring, wise decision. I’m proud of you.”God. Fucking god. It hurts but it also feels like a rush of hope and Eddie could scream. Or cry. Or both. And doesn’t know which he should do, but he’s definitely dangling over a 5000 foot cliff somewhere. Why does something he inexplicably wants so badly make him feel like such shit?~Eddie arrives in El Paso to mend his family and confront his childhood.

entry.title: Shape Of You.
entry.summary:
Author: Pnk_strawberry1

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,926Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 43

Summary: Eddie Diaz is a renowned professional fighter, celebrated for his power in the ring, and a devoted single father to his son Christopher, who brings immense joy to his life. However, Eddie has a deep-seated dislike for the idea of soulmates and predetermined relationships.On the other hand, Evan Buckley, a brave firefighter, has always held onto the hope of finding his soulmate, and his dreams have been filled with visions of their perfect encounter. So, when he finally meets Eddie on a normal Tuesday call, he is happy, excited, overjoyed, only to discover that his soulmate hates the idea of soulmates and is straight!?Will they be able to overcome their differences and find a deeper connection?———OREddie Diaz, a professional fighter and single father, Evan Buckley a firefighter, Happened to be soulmates! They are meant for each other, right? One problem though will maybe two Eddie Diaz hates Soulmates and is also Straight!?

entry.title: Operation Dancing in the Flames
entry.summary:
Author: Drake_Goldwin

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,506Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: Buck has always been good at risking his life — but risking his heart is another story. When a single moment shatters the lie he's been telling himself, he's left with a choice: stay silent and lose everything, or race against time to say the words that could change his life forever. Across miles, fears, and a lifetime of almosts, Buck sets out on the most terrifying rescue mission of all — saving his own heart.Because sometimes love doesn’t wait... and neither can he.

entry.title: My bloody steps leave a trail (I beg you to follow)
entry.summary:
Author: That_humanpersonthing

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,107Chapters: 5/11Kudos: 64

Summary: What if Eddie wasn't ok after Chris left. What if his days started with a practiced smile, and scratches on his thighs so he could feel something other then the numbness. To make him feel something, after being left with nothing when his son walked out the door. What if Eddie saw no hope in getting what he wanted back, he made a plan.Or what if Eddie gives himself two weeks to ensure everything will be ok, and then he'll be gone.
